body: You were born and raised among rolling plains or savannas. You spent much of your youth exploring these vast reaches and know many of the savanna's secrets. Pick one of the following skills: Handle Animal, Knowledge (nature), or Ride. You gain a +1 trait bonus on that skill, and it is always a class skill for you.
name: Savanna Child
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Regional Traits/Savanna Child
